PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-05502013-05-09PS,  ,  ,  , 
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Licences Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS, which extends the Possession Only Licence eligibility measure for an additional one year period until May 16, 2014, thereby removing the requirement for previous holders of these licences to take the firearms safety training course and obtain a Possession and Acquisition Licence.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0095 Publication Date: 2013-05-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Firearms Licences Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS, which extends the Possession Only Licence eligibility measure for an additional one year period until May 16, 2014, thereby removing the requirement for previous holders of these licences to take the firearms safety training course and obtain a Possession and Acquisition Licence.
